title: When one of your teammates claims the game has been going on for a long time at 35 minutes

replies.body: The real joke is that in the current meta, 35 minute games are pretty long.
Long relative to the meta ~~Long~~
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ahpe,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l6i3jHbO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-14T22:38:35.545+0000)
>
> {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

do you honestly not understand it?
Nah it's an honest whooooosh for me

> [{quoted}](name=Ahpe,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l6i3jHbO,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-07-14T22:41:51.346+0000)
>
> Nah it's an honest whooooosh for me

back in season 5-6 60 minutes was just a regular game
60 mins always was a really long game -_-

> [{quoted}](name=remakoro,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l6i3jHbO,comment-id=00010000000000010001,timestamp=2018-07-15T01:50:21.610+0000)
>
> 60 mins always was a really long game -_-

It was, but it was still average game time back then lol
Average before season 6 was in the ballpark of 30-45 minutes. 50 minutes was always considered a long game.

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l6i3jHbO,comment-id=0001000000000001000100000000,timestamp=2018-07-15T04:58:01.793+0000)
>
> Average before season 6 was in the ballpark of 30-45 minutes. 50 minutes was always considered a long game.

na it was 45-60, hence why no one who played back then was phased at 60 mins games, but like holy shit at 90 minutes games.

imagine adcs back in season 5 who always comfortly played the 40 min for 4/5 items skip time foward to now and try to play a game today, that would be funny af

I used it as a ballpark because I never remember 60 being the average game length. As I remember, 60 minutes was actually used as the metric for how much free time you should have for a single game (also when accounting for Draft picking).

Perhaps that's why you're thinking "60 was the average" because for how much I played back then, anything above 50 was rare. And now it's like getting a shiny pokemon.

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l6i3jHbO,comment-id=000100000000000100010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-15T06:57:57.376+0000)
>
> I used it as a ballpark because I never remember 60 being the average game length. As I remember, 60 minutes was actually used as the metric for how much free time you should have for a single game (also when accounting for Draft picking).
> 
> Perhaps that's why you're thinking "60 was the average" because for how much I played back then, anything above 50 was rare. And now it's like getting a shiny pokemon.

Na, end of season 5 and maybe a little of early s6, when maokai pre-rework was god, games tended to reach 60 mins on average, but then again that would also depend on what elo was being played in also, so maybe we just had different experiences.

Nowadays it's not even a shiny pokemon, it's litterally like going for an event pokemon at this point. (with the occasional hacked mews)

They never reached 60 mins on average, stop trying to pull that out of your ass
Edit: they didn't reach 60 on average even when they added shields to turrets and laser turrets and it was very easy to stall games

> [{quoted}](name=Marothennan,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l6i3jHbO,comment-id=00010000000000010001000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2018-07-15T10:19:32.421+0000)
>
> They never reached 60 mins on average, stop trying to pull that out of your ass
> Edit: they didn't reach 60 on average even when they added shields to turrets and laser turrets and it was very easy to stall games

ima just have to say this again so you can stop trying to think you're some tough shit.

so maybe we just had different experiences

He is talking about the average of all games and he’s right they were about 35-40 minutes with long games going 60. You are talking about your own personal experience filtered through your own memory bias.
S1 they were super common

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l6i3jHbO,comment-id=000100000000000100010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-15T06:57:57.376+0000)
>
> I used it as a ballpark because I never remember 60 being the average game length. As I remember, 60 minutes was actually used as the metric for how much free time you should have for a single game (also when accounting for Draft picking).
> 
> Perhaps that's why you're thinking "60 was the average" because for how much I played back then, anything above 50 was rare. And now it's like getting a shiny ~~pokemon~~ **missingno**.

FTFY
40\. 40 was the average.
Season 1 was 50-90.

Wtf are you smoking? Season One averages were about 35 minutes. By Season 3, when League was officially released as an Esport, it was down to about 32 minutes. It's riding about 31 minutes right now:  

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/rankings/game-durations
Each MMR was always different. The one I was in had lonnnggggggg assssss games.

> [{quoted}](name=GigglesO,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l6i3jHbO,comment-id=00010000000000010002,timestamp=2018-07-15T15:04:06.359+0000)
>
> Season 1 was 50-90.

well i cant say anything about season 1 as i didn't play then, so damn that's something
Thats the honest truth, I remember crying my way through promo series desperately trying to not tilt or throw at the 50 minute mark EVERY DAMN TIME
Because 35 minutes, to much of the playerbase, is not a "long" game.
OH LOL

> [{quoted}](name=Ahpe,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l6i3jHbO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-14T22:38:35.545+0000)
>
> {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

League used  to be a Moba and not a 15 minute battle royale

It's a 31 minute battle royale.

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/rankings/game-durations

I really miss those days.

Personally, I plan to pack up, get back what I can, and get out after this season.

I miss 30-45 minute long games a lot. 60 minute games were also like one in every 20 games and you used to get the odd crazy late game of like 70-90 minutes. I've been playing since season 1 and I vividly remember the longest game we ever played in season 5 which was 107 minutes long. It was so insane but we won the game and I felt like I had just won an Olympic medal, it was so good.
Mine was S1 at like 114. Improved fortify anyone ?
Fortify should come back as a keystone
That would be great, I really wish they would make Ohm Wrecker dual purpose so that you could also defend your tower with it.
It still Is 31 minutes.... https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/rankings/game-durations
god 35 min used to be the standard!

Never has. Historical averages put game length between 33-31 minute average, and this season is still 31.

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/rankings/game-durations

My longest game was 1 hour 56 min. 
Back In Season 2

@ 35 minutes:
"This game is getting long."

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/2013/01/new.gif
He hit 30 yesterday.
I remember when games would last AT LEAST 40 minutes. Very rarely did they end before 30 unless someone was trolling.

Historical records put mean games at 33-31 minutes throughout it existence. It's still 31 minutes....

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/rankings/game-durations
I made a game last for 2 hours once... that was fun.

> [{quoted}](name=WyvernEgg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l6i3jHbO,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-07-15T01:42:20.375+0000)I made a game last for 2 hours once... that was fun.

i love how the word "made" suggests you willing decided to make a game last nearly 2 hours

also the masochistic "that was fun" along with the ahri summoner icon make this such an iconic reply

> [{quoted}](name=WyvernEgg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=l6i3jHbO,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-07-15T01:42:20.375+0000)
>
> I made a game last for 2 hours once... that was fun.

nice name!
No _norm_ is worth more than 35 minutes tbh. I've held this opinion for the past 4 years, at least.
{{champion:268}} Shurima! Your emperor will never return!
It's even funnier if you're one of those people (like me), who's played a 90+ minute game (and won ;D ).
LOL
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ztVMib1T4T4
